description:
The ShopYourWay® app takes the ShopYourWay® experience on the go! Unlock Groupons, coupons, deals, points, and discounts, enter sweepstakes, or chat with associates, all right from your phone. 

With the ShopYourWay® app, you can: 

• Discover exclusive deals and discounts right on your phone
• Get 5% back in points on all Groupon purchases!!
• Load digital coupons to your account with My Coupons
• Enter for a chance to win points, products, and more with our Sweeps
• Keep all your member information close at hand
• Tell your friends where you’re shopping and unlock points with Shop’in®
• Get real answers from real people with Get Advice®
releaseNotes:
Simple and Clean: The Next Generation of Shopping
 
We’re excited to announce the release of the completely redesigned Shop Your Way app!
 
The next phase in mobile shopping, we took what you loved most about the dynamic homepage and redesigned everything into a streamlined, stylish, and easy-to-use design.
 
Structured according to your motivations, we’ve taken Shop, Rewards, Around Me, and Get Advice and elevated them to a whole new level.
 
Shop - For those of you that know what you want, Shop lets you search products, see products that are recommended for you, find deals, and easily access your browsing history, which now triggers your search flow.
 
Rewards - Everything you need for rewards-related info, you can see your points, member card, enter sweepstakes, and even buy coupons.
 
Around Me - Shop’in for stores and locations nearby, and find what you’re looking for when you need it.
 
Get Advice - Receive advice from professionals and the Shop Your Way community, and return the favor by helping others answer questions and find the right products they are looking for.
